header_text: You are getting your annual physical with your doctor. After an initial exam, your doctor says that something looks unusual and that you will need to get a second opinion. When it comes to managing your anxiety while you are in the exam room, you are capable.

elements.Text: Are you capable of managing your anxiety while waiting for your doctor?
